release_notes:
- Version 2.2.1 Release
-STORY QUESTS HYPE, there is now a main quests section, click the update button and you will be getting new info as it is added
- Log text files reading to know when quests are completed or accepted ingame is fixed
- Import quest states from logs on quest tree is fixed
- New way on rendering markers, you will notice markers crisp
- New way on handling zooming, using minimap or full screen and zooming in and out will be better for all cases by default, feel free to change marker sizes
- Some fixes to 4k monitors. If you use a 4k monitor with tarkovquestie let me know if it feels good
